attributes.comment:
Friends of mine are trying to adopt a child. Due to all the delays, much of their
paperwork has expired. Now they have to refile and pay all the fees over again.
This is an expensive proposition as it is. Now they find that the fees are going to
be increased by up to 66%. It seems to me that the fees were high enough to
begin with. Plus they now have to pay them again. All they want to do is adopt a
child that would otherwise be shunned in it's own country. Thay can't have a child
of their own. They would give this child a good home. Now it looks as if our own
government is trying to make this impossible for them. Please reconsider this
proposal. All they want to do is what is right. Thank you for any consideration you
can give this.

Comment on FR Doc #
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Charles W. Brown Sr
